title: The Blockies Guide - Managing weeds on small farms and acres

subtasks: Prevent weeds from entering the property.
Control weeds before they seed or spread.
Identify weeds to determine appropriate control methods.

tasks.task: -East: Managing weeds on a property with biosecurity in mind, emphasizing prevention, regular inspection, and appropriate control methods. Users are directed to specific practices (e.g., holding paddocks, vehicle washing, checking new fodder), key times for intervention (post-rain, spring), and tools like local apps and authorities for identification and support. The task aims to balance the necessity of controlling invasive species with available resources and best practices.
